name: LoopingListIterator_nextTest
description: Unit tests for the next() method of the LoopingListIterator class.

test_cases.name: testNextWithElements
test_cases.description: Tests the next() method of LoopingListIterator with elements in the list, ensuring it loops back to the start.

test_cases.name: testNextWithEmptyList
test_cases.description: Tests the next() method of LoopingListIterator with an empty list, expecting a NoSuchElementException.

test_cases.name: testNextWithReset
test_cases.description: Tests the next() method of LoopingListIterator after resetting the iterator, ensuring it starts from the beginning.

test_cases.name: testNextWithHasNext
test_cases.description: Tests the next() method of LoopingListIterator in conjunction with the hasNext() method, ensuring it loops correctly.
